headline.print_headline: Pianists at Opposite Ends of the Scale
headline.main: Review: Maurizio Pollini and Lang Lang: A Study in Contrasts at Carnegie Hall

snippet: These two pianists catered to distinctly different crowds in separate shows over the weekend.
abstract: David Allen reviews classical music performances by pianists Maurizio Pollini and Lang Lang at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: These two pianists catered to distinctly different crowds in separate shows over the weekend.
